docs.text:
Angular CLI


概述


The Angular CLI is a tool to initialize, develop, scaffold  and maintain 
Angular
 applications


入门


To install the Angular CLI:


npm install -g @angular/cli




Generating and serving an Angular project via a development server 
Create
 and 
run
 a new project:


ng new my-project

cd
 my-project
ng serve




Navigate to http://localhost:4200/. The app will automatically reload if you change any of the source files.


捆绑


All builds make use of bundling, and using the 
--prod
 flag in  
ng build --prod
 or 
ng serve --prod
 will also make use of uglifying and tree-shaking functionality.


单元测试


ng 
test





Tests will execute after a build is executed via 
Karma
, and it will automatically watch your files for changes. You can run tests a single time via 
--watch=false
 or 
--single-run
.


端到端测试


ng e2e




在运行测试之前，请确保您通过“ng serve”服务应用程序。
端到端测试通过
量角器
运行.


其他命令




ng new


ng serve


ng generate


ng lint


ng test


ng e2e


ng build


ng get/ng set


ng doc


ng eject


ng xi18n


ng update




配置架构




配置架构




附加信息


有几个
故事
会引导您设置Angular应用程序的其他方面。

To install the Angular CLI:  npm install -g @angular/cli  Generating and serving an Angular project via a development server  Create  and  run  a new project:  ng new my-project cd  my-project
ng serve  Navigate to http://localhost:4200/. The app will automatically reload if you change any of the source files.

ng e2e  在运行测试之前，请确保您通过“ng serve”服务应用程序。
端到端测试通过 量角器 运行.
